WHO AM I

THOFIK WIRANATA

Front-end Engineer at Sociolla

Hi, I'm a Front-end Engineer with 3+ years of professional experience, based in Jakarta. I develop compelling designs that spring to life using transition and animations that suit my clients, using the most sophisticated technologies available today for fully interactive and responsive websites and apps. I love doing front end code from scratch, made plugin and javascript library, because it's not just fun but teach me to deep understanding about code. I can write back-end code too, with a good understanding of the backend code and front end code I can make anything possible.
